thread.title: EU Raises Pressure on Trump to Drop Tariff Plan

author: Emre Peker
title: EU Raises Pressure on Trump to Drop Tariff Plan
text:
BRUSSELS—The European Union on Wednesday urged President Donald Trump to rethink his planned steel and aluminum tariffs, challenging U.S. national security claims and threatening to strike back unless the White House reverses course.
EU officials have been in close contact with the bloc’s 28 members and trading partners to jointly counter U.S. measures, European Trade Commissioner Cecilia Malmstrom said after the bloc’s executive reviewed its strategy.
... RELATED VIDEO President Trump signed an executive order on Tuesday that imposed tariffs on washing machines and solar panels. WSJ's Gerald F. Seib examined whether these moves could ignite a trade war with South Korea and China. Photo: AP (Originally Published January 24, 2018)
